Title: The commune's dining hall is excellent, the women are highly joyful, from now on they are no longer surrounded by pots, they swagger like heroes on the frontline of production
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社) Beijing
Notes: This is a print from the second edition (January 1959).The top left and top right corners were missing and have been restored (before we acquired the poster).
